div1.p: Thank you for your order of July 8th and remittance for a copy of HANDCARTS TO ZION. The book has been carefully packed and shipped to you.

We have also sent several of our catalogs for your reference shelves and we hope you will keep them for frequent use. For more than fifty years we have specialized in basic documentary source material in American history, and in addition to our own publications, we maintain perhaps the largest stock of our of print material in this field to be found anywhere in the county.
Please let us know how we may serve you.
